sentences.en: Conclusion: Make good preparations before operation, nurse meticulously after operation, with no syndrome.
sentences.cn: 结论术前精心准备, 术后精心护理, 无护理并发症的发生.

sentences.en: Davis stuck to that decision resolve meticulously.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯一丝不苟地坚持执行这一决定.

sentences.en: Don't try to cater to others meticulously, otherwise you will lose yourself.
sentences.cn: 不要刻意去迎合别人, 否则会失去自己.

sentences.en: Each week she meticulously entered in her notebooks all sums received.
sentences.cn: 每个星期她都细心地在笔记本上记下所有收到的款项。

sentences.en: He meticulously etched the image of & quot ; mother & quot; in the work.
sentences.cn: 他精心 刻划 了作品中“母亲”的形象.

sentences.en: He meticulously wound that clock with a special key each day.
sentences.cn: 他每天都用一只特别的钥匙小心翼翼地给钟上发条.

sentences.en: She is always meticulously accurate in punctuation and spelling.
sentences.cn: 她的标点和拼写总是非常精确.

sentences.en: She meticulously cleaned the gun and locked it away in its case.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地把枪擦拭干净，放进枪盒里锁好。

sentences.en: The best students use words and images meticulously, without dissipating their power.
sentences.cn: 最优秀的学生小心翼翼地使用词句和图片, 以免使其[关注和揭示的]能力消散.

sentences.en: The flat had been meticulously cleaned.
sentences.cn: 公寓被仔仔细细地打扫过了。

sentences.en: The flowerbeds, always before so meticulously tended , needed weeding as well.
sentences.cn: 过去总是精心料理的花坛现在也亟待除草.

sentences.en: The hammer's silvery head was etched with holy runs and its haft was meticulously wrapped in blue leather.
sentences.cn: 锤子头是纯银制成的，雕刻着神圣符文，而握柄则被精心地包裹在蓝色的皮革中。

sentences.en: This factory's female workers meticulously tailor export garments one after another.
sentences.cn: 该厂女工细心缝制出一件件出口服装.

sentences.en: Wish you could appreciate the beauty we select meticulously for you!
sentences.cn: 但愿您能欣赏我们为您选择的美!

words.tran_cn: 一丝不苟的；小心翼翼的；拘泥小节的
细致地；一丝不苟地；拘泥地

trans.tran_cn: 过细地，异常细致地，无微不至，精心
